title: Storm bow
data:
{{version031}} {{flavour|A longbow with the colour of dark rain clouds that fires arrows like lightning.}} [[File:Longbow_storm_bow.png]] '''''the +8 storm bow''''' +8 [[longbow]] [[Electrocution]] brand
[[Penetration]] brand ==Desirability== The '''storm bow'''{{source ref|0.31.0|art-data.txt|780}}, as a +8 longbow of electrocution, is already a great item for [[Ranged Weapons]] users (even if it takes a hefty skill investment). The added penetration allows it to shine in corridors, where only 1 enemy may hit you, but you get to hit multiple enemies for full damage. It also lets you snipe backline enemies without using [[Dimensional Bullseye]]. While a longbow or [[triple crossbow]] of a different brand may be stronger against rElec enemies, the penetration can make this bow worth using as a swapout. ==History== *In [[0.24]], the storm bow gained the penetration brand. *Prior to [[0.23]], the storm bow would occasionally create rain [[cloud]]s around the wielder, which could turn normal terrain into shallow [[water]] and shallow water into deep water for up to 100 turns. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Bows]]
